jpo
Class ApplicationJMenuBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JMenuBar
                  jpo.ApplicationJMenuBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.MenuElement, RecentOpenFileListener, java.io.Serializable
public class ApplicationJMenuBar
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, RecentOpenFileListener

This class builds the main menu of the Jpo application. It creates all the menu items and listens for the events. The events are processed and desired actions are communicated back to the object which is requesting the menu to be built through the ApplicationMenuInterface interface methods.

See Also:
Serialized Form
